#summary BadVPN and NCD installation

= Gentoo =

The BadVPN package is available in the Portage tree as [http://packages.gentoo.org/package/net-misc/badvpn net-misc/badvpn].

= Arch =

Use the [https://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=48249 AUR package].

= Ubuntu =

BadVPN builds are available [https://launchpad.net/~ambrop7/+archive/badvpn/+packages in a PPA].

To install BadVPN from this PPA, run as root:
{{{
add-apt-repository ppa:ambrop7/badvpn
apt-get update
apt-get install badvpn
}}}

= Compiling from source =

See [http://code.google.com/p/badvpn/source/browse/trunk/INSTALL INSTALL].
